tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE international_vendors (vendor_id INT, vendor_name VARCHAR(255), product_catalog TEXT, pricing_information JSONB, order_details JSONB)
CREATE TABLE vendors (vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, vendor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE products (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, vendor_id INT NOT NULL, price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id));

CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  vendor_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  order_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    vendor_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendors(vendor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE pricing (
    pricing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    currency VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    total_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE prices (
    price_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID NOT NULL,
    vendor_id UUID NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    currency VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID NOT NULL,
    vendor_id UUID NOT NULL,
    order_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    quantity INT
);
